Text: Why does no better release come up?

I'm not downloading this because your quality is too low; I'd rather wait for a decent copy than download a poor one.
An hour long show (45 min. without commercials) should be at least 300 MB, 350 is a good target.

Thanks for the effort, hope this helps with the quality of your future uploads.
The audio is just terrible.  The first 10 seconds of video looked watchable but very blocky.  Try doubling the bitrate on both audio and video.

WORST AUDIO EVER!
I have not heard audio this bad since the 90s.
